column1: #Text=(In reply to:This was an informative and humorous article showing the lack of utility of another piece of pointless electronic junk being foisted on the public to swell Apple's coffers.

#Text=Hopefully it will flop...-- DennisCasaccio) I followed you thoughts until you used the code word, 'coffers', something I hear the union bosses use when deriding someone's profit from exceptional effort, hard work, risk and the use of their own capital.You're dismissed now.
